ing: 10 slices pickled jalapeno peppers with juice, or to taste
des: "Blending canned crushed tomatoes with pickled jalapeno peppers and fresh cilantro makes an easy and tasty salsa."
ins: Blend crushed tomatoes, jalapeno peppers with juice, cilantro leaves, salt, and garlic powder in a blender until smooth. Refrigerate 8 hours to overnight.
